book.synopsis: Set on the Caribbean coast of South America, this love story brings together Fermina Daza, her distinguished husband, and a man who has secretly loved her for more than fifty years
book.title_long: El Amor En Los Tiempos Del Colera / Love in the Time of Cholera (G K Hall Large Print Book Series) (English and Spanish Edition)
